## UrlQueryValue type

### UrlQueryValue type

Type to represent the value of a single query variable.

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
export declare type UrlQueryValue = string | number | boolean | string[] | number[] | boolean[] | undefined | null;
```
<b>Import</b>

```typescript
import { UrlQueryValue } from '@grafana/data';
```
